alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 26 at 11:32AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH THURSDAY... WHAT...Flash flooding caused by heavy rainfall is possible WHERE...American Samoa WHEN...Through Thursday IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall may cause flooding on roadways and properties and overflowing of streams. ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Thunderstorms east of Manu`a will increase flash flooding conditions for the territory. Landslides are also possible with saturated soils. Nofo Va`ava`aia mo Tafega ma Lologa Ofisa o le Tau Pago Pago AS 1112 Taeao Aso Lulu Ianuari 26 2022 ...UA IAI LE NOFO VA`AVA`AIA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA E OO I LE ASO TOFI... MAFUAAGA...O Lologa ma Tafega e ono mafua mai i le tetele o timuga e lata mai i le atunu`u. NOFOAGA...Amerika Samoa TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le Aso Tofi AAFIAGA...O le tetele o timuga e ono mafua ai lologa ma tafega i luga o aualatele ma nofoaga a`afia gofie, fa`apea auvai pa pa. E mafai fo`i ona tutupu mai sologa i mauga ona o le susu o le eleele ua iai nei. FA`AMATALAGA FA`AOPOOPO...O faititili o loo lata mai i le atunu`u e mafai ona mafua ai lologa ma tafega i luga o le atusamoa. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O le uiga o le nofo vaavaaia mo tafega ma lologa, o le ono faatupula`ia lea o le tetele o timuga, tafega ma lologa, fa`apea sologa mai i mauga po o eleelee, ona o uiga louloua o le tau. E tatau ona tapena ma faalogologo i le leitio mo tala o le tau, ae maise pe a iai se faailo mo se lapataiga mo tafega ma lologa.
info.instruction: A flood watch means that conditions may develop that lead to flash flooding. You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should flash flood warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
